name: SageLogs
description: Capture client side logs from users to more easily debug problems on remote computers.

scripts.min: mkdir -p dist && find src -name '*.js' -print0 | xargs -0 cat > dist/SageLog.js && node_modules/minify/bin/minify dist/SageLog.js > dist/SageLog.min.js

author: James Mortensen
